title: Small Studio/1bath, elevator,  gym, dogs/cats, BEACH, buses and store
posting_body: ['Please TEXT for FASTER response!!', '312-857-8306', "De' Xeunxom", 'Market rate: $1075-$1175', 'Rehabbed building in Uptown it with AMENITIES', '-SMALL Studio / 1 Bathroom full size appliance', '-Stainless steel appliances (Fridge, gas stove/oven, microwave and dishwasher)', '-Hardwood floor throughout', '-light countertop in Kitchen and bathroom', '-ample cabinets', '-stainless steel appliances (fridge, gas stove/oven, dishwasher and hood range)', '-subway tile tub area/or *WALK in shower*', '-Wall air conditioner', '-radiator heating', '-elevator building', '-GRAND lobby', '-Media room with billiard, scrabble board, lounge area and Big screen TV', '-24/7 access to fitness center', '-common laundry room', '-evening door staff', '-on site management office', '-on site maintenance', '-2 blocks to both Argyle CTA and Berwyn CTA Red Line stops', '-1 block to major grocery store', '-easy access to Lake Shore Dr', '-Buses within walking distance #146, #151, #36, #92 and #147 EXPRESS bus to Downtown', '-bike/running path, lake, and beach just 2 blocks away', '-Full furnished guest suite', '-parking available (Monthly charge)', '-Dogs and cats welcome (weight and breed restrictions)', '*select unit*', '**Photo are for illustration purpose**', '***Pricing and availability are subject to change***', 'North Star Real Estate Group', '1249 W. Devon Ave, Chicago, IL 60660, Tel: 312-722-6773']
